info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 5:07PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sherman County through 545 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Mason City, or 24 miles southwest of Ord, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sherman County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
